title: Undergraduate Researcher
highlights: Conduct aerodynamic research under Dr. Luciano Demasi (top 2% cited aerospace engineering author).
Analyze unsteady aerodynamics, wing structures, and aeroelastic effects using computational and experimental methods.
Author and format technical research papers in LaTeX (MiKTeX).

title: Founder & President
highlights: Founded and scaled a professional development network to 50+ active members.
Directed operations including marketing, recruitment, and funding strategies.
Coordinated employer panels and career workshops.

title: President / VP / Energy Storage Team Lead
highlights: Lead a 200+ member FSAE electric team across project management, operations, and budget planning.
Established the team’s first operations framework for sponsorships, outreach, safety, and recruitment.
Researched, designed, and fabricated high‑voltage tractive battery; −8% weight, −70% wiring complexity, −15% losses; increased overall efficiency.
Developed documentation and validation standards for future subsystem designs and manufacturing.

title: Integrated Management System Intern
highlights: Streamlined documentation workflows for NASA’s Integrated Management System team and supported compliance audits.
Maintained internal web applications for document control; improved efficiency by ~10%.
Authored technical memos, data sheets, and procedural updates; earned 8 NASA certifications.

title: Project Manager
highlights: Directed a 4‑part project plan and led general body meetings.
Implemented project tracking and design documentation tools.
Led IAM3D Drone Competition effort; placed 4th internationally.
Managed procurement, budgeting, and travel logistics.
